code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import Portfolio from"../pages/Portfolio";var useStyles=makeStyles({root:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",justifyContent:"space-evenly",alignItems:"center",margin:"100px auto 50px auto ",width:"60%"},title:{color:"#a12bcc",textAlign:"center",margin:"0 auto 50px auto"},userBalance:{margin:"0 auto"}});var PortfolioContainer=function PortfolioContainer(props){var classes=useStyles();var currentUser=useSelector(function(state){return state.login.currentUser;});var transactions=currentUser.transactions;var renderUniqueStocks=function renderUniqueStocks(){if(transactions){var userStocks=transactions.map(function(item){return item.stock;});var checked={};var uniqueUserStocks=[];userStocks.forEach(function(stock){if(!checked[stock.ticker]){uniqueUserStocks.push(stock);checked[stock.ticker]=true;}});return uniqueUserStocks;}};var userPortfolio=renderUniqueStocks();var renderPortfolio=function renderPortfolio(userPortfolio){return userPortfolio.map(function(stock){return React.createElement(Portfolio,{key:stock.id,stock:stock});});};return React.createElement("div",{className:classes.root},React.createElement("h1",{className:classes.title},"Portfolio"),React.createElement("h5",{className:classes.userBalance},"Your Current Balance: $",currentUser.balance),renderPortfolio(userPortfolio));};export default PortfolioContainer;
